tool_description: Get every game on itch.io through a title or paginated search. Updated daily.
name: Itch io games
title: Itch io games

api_list.name: Search by title
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://itch-io-games.p.rapidapi.com/games/itchio/search/title/Captain Warlog"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "itch-io-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://itch-io-games.p.rapidapi.com/games/itchio/search/title/{title}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "itch-io-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Paginated search
api_list.description: Get all games through a paginated search (36 results/page).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://itch-io-games.p.rapidapi.com/games/itchio/page/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "itch-io-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
